DOC.brief_title: Effect NVA237 Exercise Endurance Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Patients sign Informed Consent Form prior initiation studyrelated procedure Patients moderate severe stable COPD ( clinical diagnosis compliance GOLD 2008 ) Current exsmokers smoke history ≥ 10 pack year . ( Ten packyears define 20 cigarette day 10 year , 10 cigarette day 20 year etc. ) . Patients postbronchodilator FEV1 ≥ 40 < 70 % predict normal , postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 0.7 screening . ( Post refer high postbronchodilator value inhalation 80 μg ipratropium bromide ) Increase FEV1 pre postbronchodilator assessment ≥ 5 % Pregnant woman nurse mother Women childbearing potential Patients COPD exacerbation ( whether hospitalize ) 6 week prior Visit 1 Visit 1 Visit 4 Patients low respiratory tract infection 6 week prior Visit 1 Patients require long term oxygen therapy daily basis chronic hypoxemia Patients rest ( 5 min ) oxygen SaO2 ( SpO2 ) saturation room air < 85 % Patients maximum workload ( Wmax ) value < 20 W ( determine incremental cycle endurance test ) Visit 2 . Patients whose exercise endurance time submaximal workload 25 min baseline Patients clinically significant abnormality screen baseline ECG judgment investigator would potential risk enrol study Patients history long QT syndrome whose QTc prolong ( > 450 m male > 470 ms female ) screening ( Fredericia 's correction ) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply
